description: A historical figure known for a pivotal speech appears to be struggling with basic arithmetic to determine the date of a past event mentioned in his address. He is receiving calculating assistance from a companion who resembles a working man. The scene presents an absurd, literal interpretation of a famous historical phrase as a math problem. The contrast between the solemnity of the historical figure and the mundane task creates irony. This surreal scenario is set within what appears to be a train car or carriage.
caption:
"Well, Mr. President, let's see
 take away three, carry the two
 be four score and seven years ago."
